body: Good story!  I labored over this and read it in Japanese.  Standard stuff, our hero Youta is the envy of some neighbor boys for his hot mom.  It's his birthday and they have cake, but the father isn't home because he's on a 'fishing trip' but she mentions young girls and a divorce.  She later casually asks if he wants something for his birthday, specifically sex.  She chides him a bit on his fumbling.  Later he is sexually frustrated and loud in the middle of the night and his mom is just sexually frustrated and awake.  He asks her to teach him and be his first and she gladly obliges.  The rest is standard - his cock is big, hard, and lively, and she chides him a few times on his pervy lust for his mother's mouth/body.  What's not mentioned here in the tags is that page 18 he gets her into doggy-style so he can look at her ass and her ass is so tempted he can't help to do anal, which is new for her too and she likes it and urges him to use her all night, etc.
